sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section v-if="!blogPost.isLoading" class="post-container">
    {{ blogPost.post.title }}
  </section>
</template>

<script setup>
import getBlogPost from "@/composables/getBlogPost";
import router from "@/router";
import { onMounted, ref } from "vue";
import { useRouter } from "vue-router";

const router = useRouter();

const blogPost = ref({ id: null, isLoading: true, post: null });

onMounted(() => {
  blogPost.value.id = router.query.id;
  getBlogPost(blogPost);
});
</script>

<style scoped>
div {
  margin: 200px;
}
</style>
